cookierun.title: The Great Coffee Magic Mishap
cookierun.description: Espresso Cookie's magical coffee brewing goes hilariously wrong!

cookierun.title: The Chronicles of Mystic Flour Cookie
cookierun.description: Discover the mystical adventures of Mystic Flour Cookie.

cookierun.title: Cloud Haetae Cookie and the Great Steamed Bun Disaster

cookierun.title: Candy Apple Cookie and the Sweetest Truth
cookierun.description: Candy Apple Cookie and the Sweetest Truth.

cookierun.title: Dark Cacao Cookie and the Lesson of the Melting Heart
cookierun.description: A Cookie Run: Kingdom Continuation Story

dandysworld.title: Glisten's Not-So-Perfect Day
dandysworld.description: Glisten learns that perfection isn't everything in this heartwarming tale.

dandysworld.title: The Great Blackout Mystery
dandysworld.description: A thriller about friendship, problem-solving, and the importance of teamwork in the darkest of times

dandysworld.title: Dreams in the Dark
dandysworld.description: A companion story to "The Great Blackout Mystery" - exploring the same events through Astro's unique perspective and abilities.

dandysworld.title: The Mirror Mystery
dandysworld.description: A story about self-reflection, friendship, and discovering that the best mirror is a good friend who sees you clearly

dandysworld.title: The Great Hug Misunderstanding
dandysworld.description: A story about friendship, communication, and discovering that sometimes the best way to show you care is to understand what the other person really needs.

dandysworld.title: The Worst Team Ever
dandysworld.description: A story about patience, teamwork, and learning that even the most difficult people can surprise you when given a chance

dandysworld.title: The Interdimensional Study Group
dandysworld.description: A crossover adventure where Dandy's World characters meet FNAF characters, learning about friendship, teamwork, and universal values across dimensions

fnaf.title: William's Wacky Workshop
fnaf.description: William creates silly inventions in his workshop with unexpected results!

fnaf.title: Roxanne's Vanity Crisis
fnaf.description: Roxanne Wolf faces her biggest challenge yet - a bad hair day!

fnaf.title: Freddy and Sun's Daycare Disaster: A Horror Adventure
fnaf.description: Starring: Glamrock Freddy, Sun (Daycare Attendant), and Moon (Daycare Attendant)

fnaf.title: Freddy and the Truth Machine Mystery
fnaf.description: A Horror Adventure Starring: Freddy Fazbear, William Afton, Spring Bonnie, and Gregory

fnaf.title: Michael and Elizabeth's Lost Memory Game
fnaf.description: A Horror Adventure Starring: Michael Afton, Elizabeth Afton (spirit), and Circus Baby

fnaf.title: Edwin and William's Robot Rivalry
fnaf.description: A Horror Adventure Starring: Edwin Murray, William Afton, The Mimic, and Spring Bonnie

fnaf.title: Freddy's Dimensional Detective Agency
fnaf.description: A crossover adventure where FNAF characters team up with Dandy's World characters to stop William Afton's interdimensional experiments

starrystories.title: A Shocking Experiment
starrystories.description: Nova's potion experiment goes hilariously wrong when she accidentally gives Blingy a past memory potion instead of a shrinking potion!

starrystories.title: The First Spark
starrystories.description: Young Nova discovers her magical talents when her first potion experiment creates rainbow chaos and dancing soup!
